DOC.brief_summary: This study plan 1 ) identify individual Mild Cognitive Impairment ( MCI ) convert Alzheimer 's Disease ( AD ) , 2 ) explore factor associate conversion .
DOC.brief_title: Shanghai Mild Cognitive Impairment Cohort Study
DOC.criteria: 1 . Cognitive concern reflect change cognition report patient informant clinician 2 . MiniMental State Examination ( MMSE ) score 1830 ( inclusive ) 3 . Clinical Dementia Rating ( CDR ) =0.5 ; Memory Box score must least 0.5 4 . Objective memory loss* evidence Auditory Verbal Learning test ( AVLTHS ) 5 . Essentially preserved activity daily live base Alzheimer 's Disease Cooperative Study Activities Daily Living ( ADCSADL ) 6 . Notdemented , define ' '' Allcause Dementia '' ( see 3.4 . Allcause Dementia ) 7 . Willing able undergo test procedure include neuroimaging , agree longitudinal follow 8 . Written inform consent participation study include repeated neuropsychological test MRI scan
